head.supplied: 39 Elizabeth Street, ¶ Melbourne ¶ 8th Decr 1866 ¶ Dr Mueller ¶ Bought of Henry Brooks ¶ Importer of and Wholesale Dealer in...

div.p: P67/474, unit 381, VPRS 3991 inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Office, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: MS is annotated 'No 29' of 74 receipts covering materials supplied via the Botanic Garden for the Intercolonial Exhibition of Australasia, Melbourne, 1866-7, for which M was one of the Commissioners.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
p.seg: Importer of and Wholesale Dealer in

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
p.seg: British Plate, Sheet, Crown, Colored and Rolled Rough Plate Window Glass, Paper Hangings

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
p.seg: Milled and White Lead, Oils and Colors, Brushes, Varnishes &c.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
p.seg: Agent to C. E. & J. G. Potter, Paper Hanging Manufacturers, Lancashire.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
p.seg: ALL GOODS FORWARDED AT THE PURCHASERS RISK.
